titleStmt.title: Zayde a Spanish history, being a pleasant and witty novel : in two parts, compleat / originally written in French by Monsieur Segray ; done into English by P. Porter, Esq.
Zaïde. English
titleStmt.author: La Fayette, Madame de (Marie-Madeleine Pioche de La Vergne), 1634-1693.
Segrais, Jean Regnauld de, 1624-1701.
Porter, P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Milbourn for William Cademan ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Madame de La Fayette with the assistance of Segrais. Cf. BM.
In 2 parts; pt. 2 (Wing L173A, found at reel 638:5) has special t.p.: Zayde ... the second and last part ... London : Printed by T.M. for William Cademan, 1678, and separate pagination.
Advertisement: p. [1] at end of pt. 1.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library and Bodleian Library.
